name: MsiChecksumPolicy
summary: Policy for handling optional MSI checksum digits.

fields.name: None
fields.summary: Do not strip checksum digits (default, avoids accidental data loss).

fields.name: StripIfValid
fields.summary: Strip trailing checksum digit(s) when valid.

fields.name: RequireValid
fields.summary: Require valid checksum digit(s); otherwise decoding fails.
